Career

GIG-N-JAM online music community

GignJam is looking for individuals passionate about all things music.

We are using technology to build an online music community that provides fans, musicians and businesses the opportunity to explore, connect and engage.

We are looking for:

  • Music lover
  • Able to embrace rapid change
  • People-person
  • FastKlearner
  • Able to communicate effectively
  • Multi-talented and cross-functional

If you would like to join our talented team, please email your resume to us.
